level.heading: Reporting by licensees of substantiated violations against cabarets and public dance halls.
level.text: ยง 20-370.2. Reporting by licensees of substantiated violations against cabarets and public dance halls. Licensees who are convicted or otherwise found liable for violation of any of the provisions of sections 20-361, 20-360.1 or 20-360.2 that would constitute grounds for denying the issuance or renewal of a license shall within ten days of such conviction or finding report such conviction or finding to the department in a form and manner and containing such information as shall be provided by rule of the commissioner.
